document.discussion_title: Decision by Australian Energy Regulator protects solar users against unfair costs
document.topic_text: Melbourne , Australia (SPX) Aug 05, 2016 A decision by the Australian Energy Regulator (AER) will protect solar users in South Australia against discriminatory charges proposed by SA Power Networks. Clean Energy Council Policy Manager Darren Gladman said the AER decision was welcome news for solar customers and businesses in South Australia. "If the SA Power Networks proposal was successful, it would send a message that no »
